testsuite.name: LearningProgressTrackerTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #23
Expected output: "Incorrect points format.", but your output was: Unknown command.
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Learning Progress Tracker > > add students Enter student credentials or 'back' to return: > Emelia Annnora address1@mail.com The student has been added. > Ann Agnella address2@mail.com The student has been added. > Brandise Hardan address3@mail.com The student has been added. > Dolley Panther address4@mail.com The student has been added. > Trixie Winer address5@mail.com The student has been added. > Shoshana Utica address6@mail.com The student has been added. > back Total 6 students have been added. > list Students: 1 2 3 4 5 6 > add points Enter an id and points or 'back' to return: > 1 Incorrect points format. > 1 -1 1 1 1 Unknown command.
